reviewText: Talk about the mind of a middle school or high school boy! A guy would definitely enjoy this movie because it will remind him of his player wanna be friends. The jerking off and the days of when they tried too hard to get a girl. Trust me ladies it is not worth it! My brother enjoyed it and of course my husband! Somethings just can't be explained.
I bought this to practice Spanish. There are probably better tools, this is pretty sexist, and the drawings suck a little.
